attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THIS YEAR ON 11TH NOVEMBER 2008 WILL MARK THE 90TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE SIGNING OF THE ARMISTICE IN 1918 WHICH MARKED THE END OF WW1.

I ASK THE GOVERNMENT TO CONSIDER HAVING  SOME KIND OF COMMEMORATION OF THIS EVENT.

rejection.details: Please do not write in capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
